description: Built digital clones by orchestrating 3 Mastra agents equipped with 12 Composio tools and Exa via MCP for search capabilities. Safeguarded 20GB of anonymized user data with Stripe for payments, OAuth, and AES-256-GCM encryption. Powered ZeroEntropy semantic search with vector database of 200,000+ Google, Atlassian, and Slack embeddings. Shipped in 1 week a full-stack Electron app using React, Node.js, Supabase, and Fly.io that scaled to 100+ users on launch day.

Developed a customized AI assistant chatbot by streamlining OpenAI API calls to Slack Bolt App API endpoints. Designed 6 custom features and 100+ use cases for Quality Assurance, Bioinformatics, and People Ops teams. Reduced AI assistant response time by 61.3% and added multimodal support for 12 file types with LlamaParse API. Streamlined deployment, enhanced scalability, and increased containerization with Docker, Terraform, and AWS.

Completed 300+ hours of experience engineering full-stack solutions for mobile and web applications for 20 water and wastewater districts. Manipulated 2TB of data from clients in SQL and connected it to web applications using C#, JavaScript, HTML, and ASP.NET. Engineered 3 mobile apps for clients using ArcGIS Online and REST API Service to automate data updates and queries.
